# span

**Instance Property**

The horizontal and vertical span representing the amount of map to display.

## Declaration

```swift
span: CoordinateSpan;
```

## Discussion

A [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/CoordinateSpan] also defines the current zoom level used by the map object.

## Defining the region

- **center**: The center point of the region.
